entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 p.m. MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except east 90 gusting to 120 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except east 90 gusting to 120 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except east 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Blizzard or flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023
